item.title: Teaser Page/Email Signup Collection
item.description: Campaign Monitor has collected a few examples of attention getting email signup teaser pages. I also have a few I've collected in a flickr set over the last few years. http://www.campaignmonitor.com/blog/post/2717/teaser-page-design-inspiration/
